name: ZYKO
description:
Left Arrow = Rotate Left       Right Arrow = Rotate Right

Rotate the Zyko to Protect the Ball, try to get a score higher than 15.

----------

If you enjoy this game please consider Subscribing to my youtube channel.

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7iw7FtpQ84OuT3QC40m9dw

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/borcorosso/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BorcoRosso

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/borcorosso

TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@borco_rosso?lang=en

----------

Inspired by 1 player pong I made ZYKO for the 2021 Kenney Jam. To make the circle I used the play button from the Icons asset pack. The ball is a crosshair. The side things are playing cards. Thank you for playing my game.
